inn1.comm: short of length outside off, Perera cuts it off the backfoot between point and cover point for four
short of length and angled across outside off, punched to cover
further outside off and swinging away, Perera leaves it this time
beats the bat by coming closer to off stump, Perera drove and missed
in the air and it's wide of mid-off. Al Amin pitched it short and wide, giving Perera lots of room to fee his arms and he slapped it between cover and mid-off for four
length delivery outside off, Perera leans forward and leaves
angled in sharply into Dilshan, he tucks it to midwicket for a quick single
back of length outside off with some extra bounce, Perera cuts but misses
bowls it into the pads and Perera helps it to fine leg for one
fuller and wider outside off, Dilshan goes for it with a big drive and misses
brings it closer to the batsman who leaves the ball
closer to the batsman around the stumps from length, Dilshan steers it to midwicket
outside off and swinging away, Perera leaves it alone
on the leg stump this time, Perera tries to glance but it hits his pads
on length outside off, Perera pushes it to mid-off for a very quick single
length delivery outside off, Dilshan pushes it to point by opening the face of the bat
129kph, angled in sharply from outside off, Dilshan was made uncomfortable at the end, defending it towards cover
hits Dilshan's pads this time as he tried to steer it on the leg side, this one also came in sharply from off
goes down the leg side for a wide
short and wide and Perera pounces on it with an upper cut, launching it over the backward point boundary for a six!
fuller but goes down the leg side for another wide. Great take from Anamul Haque or it would have gone for four more
full on middle, driven just wide of mid-on for a single
width on offer and it's full too, Dilshan drives it past cover for two more
loud appeal for lbw - pitched up on middle, Dilshan tried to flick it on leg and missed. It hit him on the back leg and was very close, probably going down leg
cramped for room again with the sharp angle. Short of length delivery came in and Dilshan couldn't put it away
and Dilshan falls under pressure! It was a short delivery and coming in, Dilshan pulled but didn't time it properly and got a leading edge to midwicket where Mushfiqur Rahim took an easy catch
good-length ball outside off, Perera leans forward and leaves it
another good-length delivery outside off, Perera pushes it towards cover by opening the face of the bat
on middle and angled across a bit, Perera looked to pull but was cramped for room, can't put it away past the bowler
short of length around off, Perera turns it easily on the leg side this time with a small whip and Mushfiqur does well to keep the ball inside the boundary for three
length delivery outside off and angling away, Sangakkara leaves it alone
outside the leg stump, Sanga plays it just wide of the bowler with soft hands for a quick single but Al-Amin doesn't pick the ball and the midwicket fielder throws it but for overthrows
down the leg side for another wide

and the angle works! Rubel bowled it full, not giving Perera any room, Perera wanted to put it away on the leg side but didn't get any bat and the ball trapped him in front of leg stump. Didn't look plumb, it might have missed the leg stump
outside off and Chandimal leaves it alone
further outside off and it's another wide
full delivery and outside off, driven down to mid-off by Chandimal off the frontfoot
length delivery outside off and Chandimal defends it back
going towards the leg stump, Chandimal helps it to fine leg for one
short of length and outside off, Sanga pushes it to point by opening the face of the bat
on length on the stumps, Chandimal turns it to midwicket
angled in towards the batsman from back of length, Chandimal defends it towards mid-on
well outside off this time, pushed straight to cover off the backfoot
gets an edge! Angled in towards off and middle, Chandimal wanted to flick it on leg but gets an edge to gully
on length outside off, Chandimal confidently defends it back to the bowler
short of length heading towards the leg stump and it's helped to fine leg for one
short of length outside off, driven straight to cover
slightly shorter on middle, turned to deep square leg for two runs
fuller on off, driven down to mid-on for a quick single and he makes it on time despite a direct hit
driven down beautifully by Sanga! Rubel pitched it up on off, and Sanga helped it along the ground past the umpire for a four
on length outside off, the batsman leaves it alone
slightly slower on leg stump, pushed towards midwicket for one
appeal for caught behind! Al-Amin pitch fit up outside off, Sanga poked and it went just past the outside edge
on length on the leg stump, pushed to midwicket
shorter delivery just outside off, Sanga watches it go to the keeper
pitched up outside off, driven down handsomely to mid-off
on the pads this time as Sanga moved across a bit and got an inside edge onto his pads
length delivery on off and angles it away, Sanga leaves it and it's a maiden from the debutant
angled in towards the off stump, whipped straight to midwicket
on length outside off, Chandimal counters with a solid defence to mid-off
pitched up on the off stump, driven down to mid-on by Chandimal
attempted yorker and it's clipped to deep midwicket for an easy two
short and outside off, pulled to deep midwicket again, for a single
outside off on length and Sanga drives it past cover for one to keep strike

Sanga is gone too and what a huge wicket for the debutant! Al-Amin pitched it up on the stumps, Sanga came down the track to loft it over the mid-off fielder but couldn't time it and Arafat Sunny takes a good catch over his head
just over cover! Pitched outside off and Priyanjan chipped it just over cover, not timing it properly for one
strays towards the leg stump and it's helped to fine leg for one
short ball outside off is left alone
angled in from wide of the crease, Priyanjan defends and nearly ballooned it back to the bowler but it fell near the short-leg position
flighted full toss outside off, driven to deep cover for one
beaten outside off as Priyanjan leaned forward to defend but could not connect and Anamul has appeal for a stumping. But Priyanjan's toe appears to be behind the crease when the bails were taken off
comes down the track and flicks the full toss to deep midwicket for four, bringing up SL's fifty
comes down again, drives the half-volley down to long-off for one
full and towards the toes, driven inside out for one by Chandimal

and Shakib strikes in his first over! Pitched it on length from wide of the crease and aiming for the off stump, Priyanjan went back to cut but missed it completely and the umpire raised his finger. Not sure if it hit him in line of the off stump, was very very close
on length outside off, pushed to cover for a quick single
slightly flat and on off, Mathews defends it back
fuller on leg, helped straight to short fine leg
short, flat and some turn outside off, Mathews defends it back
slightly slower outside off, Mathews opens the face of the bat towards point
short delivery outside off, Mathews goes back and punches it past cover for two
comes down the track and drives the length delivery to cover
pitched up on middle with a bit of turn, thick outside edge goes behind square for one
on length outside off, left alone by Mathews
another length delivery on the stumps, Mathews leans forward and blocks
full on middle, Mathews defends it back after lunging forward
short of length outside off, steered past point for one
length delivery close to the stumps, Mathews defends it back
angled into the batsman this time, Mathews is cramped for room trying to put it away
going down the leg side, helped to short fine leg for one
slightly slower and on length, it came it after pitching and got an inside edge

oh there's a mix up and Chandimal is run out! What an effort from Shakib there - Chandimal drove the length ball towards cover point and set off for the single but Shakib dived full length to his left and threw it to Arafat Sunny at the non-striker's end and Chandimal was nowhere close to the crease
length ball turning in form outside off, Vithanage defends
turning in from off, Vithanage defends off the front foot
flighted and turning in from off, helped to square leg
more flight and turn, Vithanage defends it back to the bowler
slightly shorter outside off, Vithanage defends it on off
short and wide, there's enough time for Vithanage to go back and cut it past point for four to open his account and release some pressure
pitched outside off, Mathews defends it back
heading towards the leg side, steered to short fine leg
short of length outside off, cut firmly but straight to point

this debutant is no less, what a delivery! Arafat pitched it on length outside off and ithe flat delivery came in a bit, going through the big gap between Mathews' bat and pad to hit the off stump. Anamul Haque roars behind the stumps, Arafut Sunny has his arms in the air
no length around off, Kulasekara leans forward to defend
full on the stumps, Kulasekara defends it back. That's a maiden wicket from Arafat Sunny
on the stumps and pushed with the turn past midwicket for one
turn for Shakib outside off, Kulasekara defends it towards point
on length on off, defends it on the front foot
another one coming in form length, Kulasekara defends it on leg
leans forward again to defend it on the off side
Just one from the over as this one is also defended, back to the bowler, by Kulasekara
length delivery on off and middle, Vithanage defends it back
slightly towards middle and clipped wide of midwicket for one
tossed up on off, pushed back to the bowler

oh and one more, what's happening here! This one very similar to Mathews' dismissal - pitched outside off and it came in with the angle, going through the defence of Kulasekara to hit top of off stump and Anamul roars again!
on the pads from round the wicket, Thisara defends on the leg side
goes down the leg side for a wide
length ball with the angle on middle, Thisara defends it back
angled in from round the wicket, Vithanage defends on the frontfoot
keeps a bit low after pitching on length around off, Vithanage defends
on length outside off, pushed to the off side
full and on off, Vithanage defends it to cover
slightly shorter and outside off, driven down to long-off for one
nearly another mix up - length ball outside off was pushed to cover and Vithanage was a bit late to say no for the run
beaten outside off with a length delivery angling away
beaten again as Vithanage lunged forward to defend and the ball skidded past the bat
gets bat this time on a length ball outside off
down the leg side and Vithanage defends it to square leg
pushed to square leg again with the turn as it pitched on the leg stump
driven off the front foot to cover from length
drives it past cover for a single with a lunge forward

that's a close call for a run out! Vithanage pushed the ball from leg stump to mid-on for a cheeky single and set off early but a sharp  and flat throw from mid-on catches Vithanage just short of his crease
round the wicket on length on the stumps, defends it back
on the leg stump and it's pushed down for one
Perera tries to slog-sweep the length ball but doesn't time it properly and gets a single to del midwicket
length ball on off jumps up and Senanayake sets off late for the quick single but no direct hit this time
that's a four after a long time. Full on off and it's launched down the ground for a four to the long-off boundary
oh he's dropped it! Perera sent this one to the long-on boundary an the fielder was there but it bounced off his hands and over the top for a six
that's clean and gone! Gets it off the meat of the bat and slog-swept to the midwicket boundary for a big six
oh and one more - similar delivery and similar result. Launched to the midwicket boundary for six more
defends it with the turn to the leg side
on length on the off stump, batsman defends it back
on length outside off, driven straight to point
pushed down to long-on with the turn from length for one
short of length outside off, turned to the leg side for one
length delivery well outside off, driven straight to cover
tossed up on leg, clipped to midwicket for one
short of length outside off and turned to deep square leg with the turn for two more
flatter one outside off, pushed to short third man
flighted and turning in from length, pushed down to mid-on
turning in from length outside off, clipped to midwicket
slightly shorter and outside off, cuts it late to short third man for one
helped with the turn to midwicket
beats the outside edge as the batsman opened the face of the bat towards point
dropped at slip! Senanayake edged the length delivery outside off but Mahmudullah was not alert enough at slip to catch that
outside off and cuts it late to the third man area for two runs to bring up SL's 100
pitches on the off side, Perera defends it back to the bowler
coming in towards off, Perera leans forward and blocks it
thick edge as Senanayake went for a big drive and it went just wide of short third man for four
turning in from off, Senanayake defends this time
length delivery towards off stump, Senanayake defends again
goes down the leg side with the turn for a wide
charges down the track to negate the turn and he lofts it over the long-off bounder for a clean six
leans forward and defends the length ball on the leg side
flat and going down leg, tucks it to fine leg for one
length ball on the off stump, Senanayake defends with soft hands for a quick single
short of length ball angled towards off stump, Perera defends it back
outside the off stump and Perera gets a thick edge to third man for one
bowls a bouncer to Senanayake who ducks under it
138kph, hurries one towards the batsman and Senanayake defends just in time
outside the off stump and Senanayake pushed it to point

oh dropped again and that's six more! Perera saw the full-length ball and lofted it down the ground to long-on where Nasir got his hands to it over his head, but he lost his balance and the ball popped out and went for a six
outside off this time, pushed towards cover
length delivery outside off, Perera defends it back
short of length and turned to long-on for one
turning into the batsman who defends with a tight defence
flighted and outside off, driven over the in-field powerfully and that's four more, another good over for Sri Lanka
short of length ball on off, Perera goes back and cuts to cover point
wider outside off and Perera cuts again, finding the gap this time on the packed off-side field for four
length delivery on off, Perera defends this time
drifts down the leg side to hit Perera's pads
length ball outside off, cut to deep cover off the backfoot for one
flighted outside off, pushed to cover to end the over
full and on the pads, flicked to midwicket by Perera
full again and outside off, Perera drives it down to long-off for one

dropped but that was a very tough chance. Senanayake pulled a delivery that was not very short and got a leading edge but it fell in front of mid-on and midwicket even though the latter nearly got there
bowls a bouncer and it's called a wide
full and outside off, driven down firmly to mid-off
on the stumps this time and driven to mid-off by Senanayake
slower delivery coming in from short of length outside off, turned to midwicket
slow and turning in from length around off, Senanayake defends
turning in towards the off stump, Senanayake defends off the backfoot this time
slightly flatter and Senanayake comes down to clip it to midwicket for a quick single
pitched up on middle, pushed back to the bowler
slower through the air, Perera waits and cuts it to point for another quick single
beats the outside edge this time as the ball came in and Senanayake wanted to defend it on the off side
attempted yorker is driven down firmly to long-on for one
short of length outside off, guides it to third man for an easy single
short ball and Perera pulls it with a lot of power but the midwicket fielder gets a hand to it and keeps it to one
short ball outside off, Senanayake wanted to help it to third man but missed
short ball outside off, nudged to third man for one
low full toss on off stump, driven straight to backward point
full on middle, Senanayake comes down and drives to mid-on
comes down again but gets pad on the length ball coming from outside off
flighted and on length outside off, pushed wide of cover for one
bit of turn outside leg as Perera tucks it to midwicket for one
angled into the batsman, Senanayake stays back and guides it to short fine leg
tries a reverse sweep but can't middle it and it goes straight to short third man
comes down and pushes the ball to long-on for one
spinning away outside off, turned to the leg side for one more
goes down the leg side for a wide
shorter delivery and Senanayake defends it back
length delivery on the stumps, driven down to long-off
yorks Perera but he manages a single on the leg side
turning in towards the stumps, Senanayake pushes it back
full on middle, turned to deep midwicket and that's a fifty for Perera, what a fighting fifty from the No. 9 batsman
gets an edge as he tries to cut the ball late as it came in from outside off
and the stand has been broken! Senanayake came down the track to go over the top but missed it completely and had his stumps shattered
fuller delivery and Malinga pushes towards cover
beats Malinga outside off with some turn as he tried to defend
angled in from wide outside off, Malinga defends it back
full and wide and Perera gets his front foot out of the way to carve it over third man for four
full and wide again, driven over the covers for two as long-off cuts it in time
short of length this time, pulled to deep midwicket and they take one run with three balls to go
yorker on the off stump, Malinga defends carefully
short ball outside off, Malinga leaves it alone
length delivery coming in from outside off, Malinga leaves again
full and outside leg, Perera drives it firmly wide of long-on but the fielder does well to keep it to two
yorks Perera and no chance for a run
oh he's made a mess of it! Perera lofted that one to long-on where the fielder neither came forward, nor did he go back to stop it and misses the line of the ball and it went for a one-boucne four
and that's gone out of the park! You drop Perera so many times and that's what he'll do to you. Went down on one knee and swept it for a massive six
goes down the leg side looking for a yorker for a wide
nearly a yorker on off, pushed down to mid-off
tuning in from off stump, clipped to deep midwicket for one
full toss is smashed back and the bowler gets a hand to it
and take that! Perera gets a short ball and pulls it in his favourite area - the midwicket boundary - for six more
full on the off stump and Perera crunches it down the ground to long-off where Shakib throws himself to his left to save two runs

dropped again, would you believe it! Perera hit it high towards long on and Shakib was running in, got there on time, got his hands under the ball but the ball popped out even though Shakib juggled a couple of times but couldn't hold on to it
full on the leg stump, driven on the leg side for one
length delivery on the off side, Malinga helps it to midwicket but they obviously won't run
short of length outside off, Perera pulls it to long-on where it lands in front of the fielder after a bounce
slightly short outside off, punched off the backfoot to cover
gets time to pull this one wide of long-on and they take a run this time
turning in from outside off, Malinga gets bat on it in front of off stump
he waits for it to come to to him with the turn and defends
and he's gone, it is finally all over! Gazi pitched this on length outside off, Malinga poked and got an outside edge and Anamul took a good catch behind the stumps

inn2.comm: short of length and around off stump, Anamul defends off the backfoot

oh that's dropped, no it's taken, and how! Anamul edged the ball outside off straight to second slip where Senanayake dropped it and the ball was going to fall in front of first slip Mathews who jumped forward to got both hands under the ball and Bangladesh are 0 for 1
stifled appeal as this one struck Mominul on the pads but was going down leg
goes down the leg side for a wide
gets an inswinging yorker and Mominul gets an inside edge on the leg side
short of length outside off, Mominul punches it to point
pitches it up on off and Mominul defends it towards cover
full and swinging into the batsman, Rahman drives it to mid-on for one
swinging away from Mominul from short of length as he tried to poke, but missed
short of length on leg stump without much swing, nudged to fine leg for one
short of length and coming in, helps it to fine leg with the swing for one
full and outside off, driven with soft hands to backward point where Dilshan slip while fielding
length delivery outside off and swinging away, left by the batsman
keeps a bit low on off stump as it squares-up Shamsur a bit, and a thick outside edge goes to third man
bouncer on the leg stump and Mominul ducks under it. That's the first for the over
length delivery on the stumps, Mominul defends it back
short ball outside off and Mominul does well to keep it down and between point and cover point for two runs
short again and this time Mominul slices it short of third man for a single
swinging away form length outside off, Shamsur defends it on the off side

short and outside off, Mominul helps it with a horizontal bat over the infield on the off side through the point area for four. He only had to clear the fielders in the circle and did it well by scooping it over them
short of length on the stumps, defends it back
length delivery outside off and swinging away, left alone
good-length ball outside off, Mominul defends with soft hands and goes for a quick run
swinging in from outside off, turned to square leg for another quick single
on the leg side and clipped wide of mid-on for one
another bouncer on the leg stump and Mominul ducks under it
length ball on the middle stump, Mominul defends it on the leg side
another short ball on leg and hooked to fine leg for one
bouncer outside the off stump which the batsman leaves and it's called a wide
nearly a yorker around off and it's flicked to midwicket
low and slow full toss on middle, turned to fine leg for one
swinging down the leg side, deflects off the pads to short fine leg
angled in towards off stump, tucked wide of deep fine leg for two
outside off, Shamsur tries to cut and misses
short of length and outside off, Shamsur defends
short of length again, he defends with soft hands on off and scampers for a run
goo-length ball on middle, defends it back to the bowler
full and wide and Mominul uses the pace of the ball to drive it late past point for a four, beautiful timing there
starts off with a bouncer again and Shamsur has no trouble ducking
slower delivery on the leg side, helped to fine leg for one
second bouncer of the over and Mominul ducks this time
slower and short of length on middle, the batsman defends on the leg side
slow and high full toss, Mominul drives it in the gap again, between point and cover point and it beats the fielder in the race. No ball called by the umpire for height
hits Mominul on the pads in front of leg but it's going down leg and is too high
fuller and swinging in around off, inside edge goes to the leg side for one
tossed up outside off, Mominul defends
slightly fuller towards leg and tucked to fine leg for one
full and on middle, driven straight to midwicket
this one goes the other way after pitching on off and Shamsur follows it to defend on off
slightly short and outside off, Mominul times it very well again and bisects the field between point and cover point for four more
length ball around middle and leg, defends it on the leg side
angled towards leg, helped with the angle to fine leg for one
length delivery outside off, left alone by Mominul
slightly shorter outside off, Mominul defends with soft hands
fuller outside off, driven straight to short cover
pulled by Mominul, that's in the air but there's nobody in the deep. Perera pitch fit short, the ball went high but they got two runs by the time the fielder got there
short of length ball, Mominul defends on the off side
on length outside off, Shamsur scoops it by coming across and it goes over the keeper for two
turning in sharply towards the stump, scooped again and they take two quick runs by the time fine-leg fielder throws it back
well outside off, there's enough room for Shamsur to play it late to the third man area for two more
turns the other way this time from length and it's pushed to cover point
full on the pads, driven to midwicket where Dilshan misfields to concede a single
edged and falls just short of first slip! Was on length outside off and took the outside edge but didn't carry
outside off, Mominul cuts and misses and there's good carry right into the keeper's gloves
beaten again as Mominul tried to help it down to third man but the extra bounce gets the better of him
short of length outside off, Mominul gets bat and defends on the off side
slightly closer to the stumps from back of length, pulled for two but not from the middle of the bat and that's the fifty for Bangladesh
good line and length outside off, Mominul leaves this time
slightly wider outside off, Mominul drives and is beaten again
turning in from off, gets the pad of the batsman as he is beaten
length delivery on off, Shamsur defends off the backfoot
goes the other way this one as Shamsur chases and is beaten outside off
slightly short of length on leg, tucked to short fine leg for a quick single
tossed up outside off and Mominul seeps it in the air to the wide long-on boundary for four. He didn't quite middle it but had enough to make it land in the empty area
short ball now and he pulls it to the midwicket boundary off the backfoot. Nine from the over
short of length ball outside off, Shamsur drops his hands and leaves
slightly quicker from back of length outside off, pushed to point
short of length just outside off, Shamsur goes back and defends with soft hands for one
short ball on leg and it's pulled straight to deep fine leg after a bounce
another short of length ball outside off, helped to third man for easy single

this one's shorter and pulled away firmly on the leg side for four. There are two fielders in the deep for that shot - deep midwicket and deep fine leg but he found the gap well and it's time for drinks
short of length outside off, Shamsur defends it on leg off the backfoot
bouncer on the leg stump, Shamsur hooks and gets the glove fine on the leg side for four more

short again and it's pulled as if he new it was coming there, maybe he did. Pulled it flat off the hips to the deep midwicket boundary and it might have landed right on the boundary rope, the umpire is checking. And it has been signalled a six
away-swinging length ball outside off, jabbed to point
length ball heading towards middle stump is tucked to deep fine leg for one
down the leg side and it's helped to fine leg for one more, 12 off the over
length ball around off, Mominul defends it confidently on the off side
beats the outside edge as Mominul tries to guide it to third man
length delivery just outside off, Mominul defends solidly
oh he has handed it straight to point! Got more room to free his arms outside off, cut it straight into the hands of Dilshan as he failed to find the gap this time
short of length ball outside off, Mushfiqur leaves it alone
right on target just outside off on length, Mushfiqur defends it back solidly
Shamsur is beaten outside off as he tries to defend an away-swinging delivery from length
on the leg stump, defends it on the leg side
tight line and length on off, Shamsur defends it off the backfoot
slightly fuller outside off, square-driven to point
Shamsur hands the pressure back to Malinga by lofting it over and wide of mid-on for a four with a cross-bat shot
this time on the other side of the wicket. Got room outside off and struck a cracking four between point and third man, neither of them moved as the ball raced to the boundary
incoming delivery from outside off, Rahim defends it back
goes down the led side and it's helped to fine leg for one
and that's gone all the way! Perera pitches it short and wide, Shamsur cashes in on the room cuts it over the deep point boundary for a clean six
Sanga and Perera appeal for caught behind as Shamsur is beaten outside off, going for another cut but there appeared to be no edge
oh that's more powerful and even flatter! Perera pitched it wide again, Shamsur absolutely smashed this one square of the wicket for a flat six and brings up his fifty
slightly short of length outside off, cut straight to point
length delivery outside off is left alone
another one left alone outside off by Mushfiqur
fuller and wider, Mushfiqur cuts it square but Dilshan dives full length to his left to save a certain boundary
outside off, Mushfiqur goes for a heave but doesn't middle it as it goes to backward square leg boundary and he gets two
full and well outside off, driven straight to cover at the edge of the circle
slightly short outside off, pulled to midwicket
turns it into Rahim who chips it to midwicket
fuller outside off, scoops it to fine leg for one
helped to midwicket with the turn off the backfoot for one
turning in from length outside off, Rahim defends it back
slightly fuller on middle, helped to short fine leg
straighter on middle stump, pushed on the leg side
short of length outside off, pushed towards cover
charges down and slams it through the covers for four, there's no stopping Shamsur Rahman today
charges down again and he pulls the short ball wide of mid-on for four more, even though he had not middled it

that's gone high in the air but it's beyond Malinga's reach. Shamsur heaved and the leading edge went beyond the reach of mid-off fielder. But wait, Sangakkara has appealed for a run out because Shamsur's bat got stuck just before he made it to the crease for the second run and Sanga took the bails off. Shamsur had crossed the crease but his feet are in the air, very hard to call if he was out of the crease for sure. The third umpire has to make a call though and he calls it out
down the leg side and helped to fine leg for one
short of length outside off, defends it back to the bowler
pushed towards mid-off from length
turns away from outside off form length and Shakib leaves it
slightly fuller outside off, driven to point for one
turning in form outside off, Mushfiqur leans forward and blocks
turning in again from length, defends it back
slightly shorter, turned to the leg side but not enough time for a run
short of length outside off, defends it to cover point
length delivery on the stumps, defends it on the leg side
short of length just outside off, pushed to point off the backfoot
shorter outside off, guides it to third man for one
just beats the outside edge. It was just outside off as Mushfiqur tried to defend but missed
on middle stump, clipped to fine leg for one
helped to the leg side with the turn for a single

oh and another run out chance, or has he made it? Shafiq pushed the ball to point and wanted the single but a flat throw from an agile Malinga helped Sanga take the bails off just in time and a diving Shakib could not make it, he has to go back
flighted and pitched on length outside off, Nasir leans forward and defends
turns in sharply  form outside off, Nasir cuts and gets an inside edge almost onto the stump
slightly fuller outside off, Nasir defends easily
a touch shorter and the extra bounce surprises the batsman and he almost got caught at short leg, but they manage a single on the leg side
extra bounce again outside off from back of length but Nasir leaves it
short of length outside off, pushed to cover
outside off and left alone again by Nasir
thick outside edge from length delivery on the off stump goes to third man
short of length outside off, Mushfiqur cuts off the backfoot and another spectacular dive from Dilshan saves a few runs
outside off and he defends it on the leg side
flighted and outside off, driven down to mid-off
full and flighted on off, pushed back to the bowler
flighted outside off, Nasir leans forward and defends
turns in sharply from length on off stump and beats the batsman
fuller on he off stump, driven with the turn down to long-on
pitched up outside off, defends it back to the bowler
Nasir breaks the shackles! Gets a short delivery outside off and he slams it over the backward point region for four
better delivery outside off is left by Nasir
almost a yorker on middle, driven down to mid-on
extra bounce from length just outside off as the batsman leaves it
angled towards the leg stump and strikes the batsman on the pad to deflect to the off side
short of length outside off, punched off the backfoot, but straight to cover point at the edge of the circle and time for more drinks
turning into the batsman, he clips it to leg for one
flighted and outside off, Nasir leans forward and blocks
drives outside off and the ball goes to point after a bounce
goes to the backfoot to cut but it turns too much and he gets an inside edge
quicker through the air and Nasir defends it back
bit of extra bounce as the batsman defends and it could have gone to short leg off the bat, but he is safe
short of length outside off, Mushfiqur pulls half-heartedly and nearly played himself on, but gets on on the leg side after an edge
shorter outside off, cut firmly off the backfoot to point
slightly fuller outside off, helps it to third man for one
well short of length outside off, guides it for one to third man
coming into the batsman, Nasir defends it back to the bowler
slightly fuller on the off stump, Nasir pushes towards cover
turns in after pitching, Mushfiqur defends on the leg side
cut off the backfoot to the point boundary and an excellent effort from Kusal Perera cuts it back to save a run

Senanayake strikes after building a lot of pressure, het gets Nasir. It was a conventional and flighted offspinner outside off, Nasir stepped forward to drive and handed an edge to Mathews to first slip
the batsman defends the ball back to the bowler after the turn
oh and one more, now we know why the short leg fielder was there! Mahmudullah played the ball with the turn to the leg side and it went straight to Priyanjan at short leg, he's gone for a duck
on length on the stumps, the batsman defends it back
well outside off, cut straight to point
short of length outside off, Mushfiqur defends off the backfoot
aimed towards middle and leg, Mushfiqur defends it back
length ball outside off, Mushfiqur now defends it to cover
angles it in from off, they take a single off the pads on the leg side
beaten outside off, Gazi looked to poke but missed
well outside off, cut off the backfoot to deep point for one

oh that was a spectacular effort from Mathews but he can't get there. Gazi lofted it to the long-off boundary, Mathews ran all the way from mid-off, nearly got his hands to it with a dive, and the ball rolled away for four
angled in towards off stump, he defends it towards midwicket and is sent back for the risky single
fuller and wider, jabbed to point by Gazi
short of length and coming in, Gazi cuts it late to third man for one
nips in after pitching outside off, they can't sneak a single with an edge on the leg side
nearly caught it, Gazi went for a slog and almost handed a catch to midwicket, where the fielder got a hand but it was very tough
tries to cut a ball outside off, misses and Sanga can't hold on to it
short ball angled in towards the batsman, Gazi drops his hands sways out of the line

and another one falls, Bangladesh are crumbling here! Gazi went for a wild slog for a ball that was coming in and got a leading edge to the cover region and Vithanage ran back towards the boundary to take a very good catch
tucks the ball from outside off to the leg side for one
short ball outside off bounces a touch extra and Sunny defends it on off
full o the off stump, flicked to midwicket for one
well outside off, guides it to third man for one
and Mushfiqur launches this one down the ground for maximum! It was pitched up, Mushfiqur went for it and cleared the boundary for a six. There was no fielder in the deep by the way
on length outside off, pushed to point off the backfoot
short of length outside off, Mushfiqur goes back and turns it to leg for one
on the leg stump on length, Sunny defends it back and Mushfiqur says no for the single,  he would want the strike
short and wide, cut away easily to deep point for one
loud appeal for lbw, it pitched on off but the ball hit the bat before thudding on to the pads
short ball angled across, Sunny sways out of the line
length delivery outside off and angling away, Sunny lets it go
brings it in from outside off, Sunny shows a solid defence
down the leg side and Sunny helps it along the way fine to beat the fine leg fielder and it's gone for four
short and wide, Mushfiqur cuts it past point, finding the gap for two more runs
short of length and close to off, Mushfiqur runs it down to third man for one
loud appeal for lbw turned down, Perera can't believe it. It pitched on leg and hit Sunny on the front pad but was a bit too high
angled into the pads, Sunny can't get it away on the leg side
fuller and outside off, driven to cover point
angled across, Sunny defends it with a straight bat
short of length and coming in, Mushfiqur nearly dragged it on to his stumps but his pads came in the way
going down the leg side, they get a leg bye to rotate the strike
Mathews strikes now, another twist in the tail. Mathews angled it across, Sunny drove away from the body and got a faint edge which was taken by Sanga easily
bouncer aimed towards Rubel who ducks under it
angled towards the pads and he defends it towards midwicket
length ball on the off stump, thick edge goes to point
attempted yorker turns into a low full toss on leg, Rubel defends it
a really slow and low full toss on the leg stump and Rubel defends it carefully
length delivery aimed at the middle stump, Rubel defends it back
now bowls a bouncer which Rubel ducks under
length ball outside off this time and Rubel shows the full face of the bat to defend it
full toss on middle, Rubel defends it back and it's a maiden

oh Mushfiqur is gone! Mathews pitched this one outside off on length but Mushfiqur went across completely, looking to scoop it fine on the leg side but only manages an edge down leg to the keeper. That's the big wicket SL wanted
on length well outside off, Al-Amin chases and misses
fuller on the pads, flicked to deep midwicket for one
on the pads again, helped to fine leg for a single
length delivery outside off, pushed to cover by Al-Amin
starts with a bouncer and Rubel is happy to duck under it
slower one towards the pads, Rubel defends it on the leg side but they decide not to go for the single
in the block hole outside off, Rubel blocks it
length delivery darted towards middle stump, Rubel defends it
onto the pads and it's helped down the leg side fine, Thisara dives to cut it back but spills it and the ball rolls towards the boundary and he catches hold of it just in time to keep it to two runs
ends the over with a bouncer too, the batsman ducks again
angled into the batsman, he clips it to the leg side for one

there's a mix-up and it's all over for Bangladesh! Rubel clipped the ball to midwicket and they set off for a single but Rubel hesitated and it was too late by then. Al-Amin had crossed him and Rubel ran towards the non-striker's end but Mathews had taken the bails off by then
